APP_ID.description: You api id get it from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot

API_HASH.description: You api hash get it from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and enter it's api token

OWNER.description: Put ids of user which can access the bot e.g 123456789

THUMBNAIL.description: Put Link of any picture. If you dont want to put the link of any picture then leave it but remember to send an image to bot before starting compressing otherwise you wont get the  video
